function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Improving ventilation system design and maintenance, implementing mechanical exhaust fans, and using portable room air cleaners with hepa filters","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing improved ventilation systems and modification to existing systems to reduce the concentration of aerosols in indoor spaces.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ensure adequate ventilation rates through natural or mechanical means, and follow specific guidelines for ventilation rate for different settings","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper installation and maintenance of hvac systems, following guidelines for air recirculation, maintaining proper temperature and humidity levels","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement measures to maintain adequate ventilation rates regardless of occupancy density, such as adjusting ventilation systems based on real-time occupancy","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase outdoor air ventilation, use appropriate filtration, and implement natural or forced ventilation techniques","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide accurate information about covid-19 transmission, emphasize the importance of ventilation, and promote behavior change to reduce close contact","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and inspection of ventilation systems, replacement of filters as needed, and monitoring of airflow rates","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use air purifiers as a supplement to hvac ventilation, ensure no direct airflow onto individuals.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct field measurements and use accurate methods for estimating ventilation performance and infection risk.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase ventilation rates by optimizing window opening or using mechanical ventilation systems","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limit exposure time, increase ventilation rates, and encourage mask-wearing","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Optimize window opening ratio, use energy-efficient ventilation systems","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adopting social distancing and installation of barriers to reduce close contact","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Upgrade ventilation systems, use air purifiers, and promote outdoor activities","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Avoiding crowded and enclosed spaces, using masks, and improving ventilation","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of ventilation systems, use of air purification technologies","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proper design and installation of displacement ventilation systems, regular monitoring monitoring","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement higher ventilation rates based on exposure time and infection
